name: Souls Afire
description:
As a mage you're not used to receiving curses. But this time they got you good: your soul is now.....a candle!

You have to complete all the levels in order to reach freedom. Drop the candle and roll, or pick the candle and create walls!  But, no matter what, protect the flame that keeps your soul alive!

Made  by:

  • seb_barrera
  • clynamen
  • 4binary1
